transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Haan ji. Sir, good afternoon. Aalu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Kaise hain sir?

Customer: Ji, badhiya ji, badhiya.

Executive: Accha, main ye keh raha tha ki kal jo hai na aapko Umang ji ne contact kiya tha sir, hamari jo another team hai, thik hai?

Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ji.

Executive: Unhone call kiya tha sir. Unhone video meeting wagera ke liye bhi aapke sath schedule kiya tha. To abhi hai aap available sir?

Customer: Video meeting to hogi na unse. Ho gayi hai na subah aaj?

Executive: Ji, ji, ji, thik hai. To kya bola sir unhone?

Customer: Unhone to category ki bola hai ki bhai category aap badhate jao dheere dheere. Maine kaha, "Mam, jo lead aa rahi hai wo portal pe show hi nahi kar rahi hai." Maine kaha, "Pehle to lead abhi achi aayi hai, pichle mahine mein. Abhi to bilkul bhi nahi aa rahi. Abhi hafta bhar ho gaya, hafta 10 din pura hi." Ab aap lead portal show kar lo. Aapke samne ek-ek ki detail padi hai. Wo hai. Us hisab se. To sir aise hi chalta rahega to, ji, aise chalta rahega to phir wo jaahir si baat hai, response apan nahi kar paate. Hamare paas sabr wala kaam nahi hai. Wo wali baat hai.

Executive: Nahi nahi, wo to baat hai sir. Ye jo hai aaj aapne subah buylead check ki thi ye Hyderabad wali 6 ghante pehle aayi thi ek jo hai 6 foot wali. Uspe sold out jo dikha raha hai uspe I am interested wali aapne activity ki thi aapne?

Customer: Ji, ji, ki thi.

Executive: Reason kya hai na ki hamara jo AI system hai na sir, agar jo aap maan lijiye koi by mistake aapki side se koi leads agar jo miss ho jati hai na sold out mein, to waha pe niche I am interested karke ek option aata hai jispe agar jo aap click karte hain to that means ki wo activity aapki capture hoti hai hamare system mein. That means ki system hamari ye observe kar leta hai ki next time is tarah ki koi bhi lead hogi to wo usko preference aapke paas jayegi sir.

Customer: Ji, ji. Nahi wo to sabhi pe karte hain. Wo wo wali baat nahi hai bhai lead sold ho rahi hai uske baad mein bhi I am interest karte hain hum ki bhai isme hum interest hain. Wo hai.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Wo wali baat hai. Lekin sir abhi to bilkul hi jaise sold out ho gaya aapke baat karne ke baad mein to bilkul hi lead wala flow bilkul hi kam ho gaya.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Ji, wo hai.

Executive: To abhi kya sir, sir main dekho ab jo product line mein aap deal kar rahe hain na usme aisa nahi hai ki daily ke daily 8-8, 10-10 lakh rupaye ki wo lead aa jayegi.

Customer: Nahi main aapko lakh ki nahi bol raha hu. Mere ko to 1 lakh plus hi de do, 1 lakh tak ki lead de do. Main ye nahi bol raha hu aap 50 crore ka kaam de do ya 50 lakh ka kaam de do. Wo nahi bol raha hu. Wo main comment hi nahi kar raha hu. Aap lead loge sir aapko bhi pata hai agar lead apan customer ko call kar de, kai customer to ye bolte hain ke bhai humko to hai hi nahi. Humko to hai hi nahi. Requirement hamari requirement puri ho gayi, aisa ho gaya. Humne to dali nahi, bacche ne dal di hogi. Wo hai. Ab aapko bhi pata hai ki 10 mein se koi ek aadha banda baat karta hai. Koi bande call uthate nahi hain. Koi kya bolte hain. Ab unko whatsapp pe bhi contact karte hain to koi jawab reply nahi aata hai. Wo hai. To aapko bhi pata hai ki abhi abhi jo aap suppose karo main maan liye abhi current package mein aapko 72 weekly buylead mil rahi hai. Nahi sir suniye meri baat. 72 customers mein se, haan, main ye keh raha hu ki 72 customers mein se koi week ke andar bhi aapka ek koi aisa positive nikal jata hai na to wo bhi bahut badi baat hai sir. Nahi aapko pata hai ye dekhiye sir, 70 bata rahe ho aap maine to teen, teen mahine kareeb ho gaye, teen mahine, 3.5 mahine ho rahe hain. To maine kam se kam jyada nahi to 500 leade to consume ki hogi. 500 mein se ek sold ho rahi hai mere paas. Ab 500 mein se ek sold hogi to kaise kaam chalega ye bataiye aap. To usme abhi aapka aapka ye ye keh raha hu ki un 500 customers mein abhi uske baad koi ek aisa bhi customer nahi nikla jo aaj ki date mein aapke paas follow up mein ho ke bhai haan ki koi rate ke liye negotiate kar raha ho ya aage kuch planning kar raha ho. Sir nikalta to main aapko call bhi nahi karta. Unhone ek mam ne kaha tha ke main ek mahine baad mein karwaungi. Ab unhone abhi mana hi kar diya. Maine main unse madam se bhi baat kari thi. To unhone bhi baat ki thi to unhone kaha ki sir wo bol rahe hain abhi late karwayenge, magar kaam chal raha hai. To unhone mana hi kar diya ki bhaiya abhi nahi karwayenge hamara hai hi nahi program. Ab kaise baar baar unko follow karein. Wo hai. Halaki hello hi ka message to dalte rehte hain. Morning mein aate hi jaise sabhi ko bola hua hai bhai hello hi dalo kya pata customer ka kab man ho. Wo hai. To agar customer jaise 500 customer se agar teen hi follow up aate hain na to main manta koi nahi aa rahe. Aur second baat ye hai ki aapne kaha tha aapke paas call aane lag jayegi directly. Wo bhi nahi aa rahi. Aur na koi message wagera aa rahe hain. Wo hai. To aapne ye cheeze sabhi kahi thi. Wo cheez ek bhi nahi hoti dikh rahi hai. Sir main keh raha hu dekhiye abhi aisa nahi hai jo category hum logo ne rakhi hai aisa to promotion nahi hai ho raha hai. Promotion to ho raha hai. Promotion performance wagera bhi dekhoge views wagera bhi aa rahe hain sir customer ka uspe aap agar jo check karoge na. Views wagera to unhone jaise customer ne aise hi de diye. Real bata raha hu main do customer ne aise hi de diye baat karne ke kya pata unko chala hoga kuch baat karne se. Wo hai. Koi maine kaam nahi kiya hai. Main jo customer ka kaam karta hu na meri best side pe dekhiye. Abhi main Jaipur ka ek kaam karke aaya tha mera local ke kaam hai. To unhone views bhi diye, star wagera sab diye. Abhi do teen din pehle ki baat hai ye. Ji, ji. Wo hai. Ji, ji. Wo hai. Views to jaise star dena hai ab mere ko aapki baat achi lagi maine star de diya aapko. Ab views diye comment bhi dalunga na sath mein to wo cheez mayne rakhti hai. Ji. Views to jaise abhi customer aap aaye maine maan samman kiya aapka. Bithaaya, nasta wasta kiya to aap kuch bahak gaya hoga aisa ki chalo wo hai. Wo wali baat hai. Lekin real bata raha hu maine jo kaam hai ban nahi kaam kiya hai pakda hai. Ab aap views pe jaoge to aap ye soch rahe ho ki bhai do customer ka to kaam final ho gaya teesre ka aur chal raha hai. Wo cheeze nahi hai agar aap vishwas karte ho to. Aur vishwas nahi karte ho to usse koi matlab hi nahi hai. Nahi nahi sir vishwas aap aapki baat ka sir aisa thodi nahi hai bhai aap koi jhoot thodi na bol rahe ho. Sir jo cheez apan kya hai jhoot level pe kaam nahi karte hain. Agar main aapke portal pe jhoot level pe kaam karu na to aapki portal ki bhi shakh giregi aur meri bhi shakh giregi. Kyunki jaahir si baat hai. Ji sir. Ab kyunki jaahir si baat hai main IndiaMART ka customer aayega aur main unko jaise kaam makrana bol ke rajnagar marble dunga. To rajnagar marble dunga to jaahir si baat hai wo 4-6 mahine mein yellow padega to wo jaahir si baat hai aapki shakh pe bhi farak padega aur mere to hai hi hai. Aur comment ko to apan customer ko rok hi nahi sakte. Comment wo wapis bhi dal sakta hai banda kya hai kya nahi hai. Ji ji. Bilkul sir bilkul correct baat hai sir. Wo wali baat hai. Wo hai. Sir wo wali baat hai aur baki koi issue nahi hai. Agar business milta hai to aap keh rahe ho ye 2 lakh mere mayne nahi hai ye samjho aap 2 lakh rupaye. Mayne nahi hai. Main per mahine ki salary baat raha hu 5 se 7 lakh rupaye. Per mahine ki. Lekin sir aap bhi meri jagah khade ho ke sochoge na to jab pata chalega. Koi bhi cheez aap salary base pe kaam kar rahe ho aapko teen mahine ki jagah ek mahine ki salary mile to aapko kaisa lagega sir? Nahi sir main samajh gaya main aapki main us cheez ke liye nahi keh raha hu sir par kahin na kahin ek thoda sa trust problem pata hai kya abhi sari cheeze abhi aap ye samjho ki aage competition ko kam karne ke liye company aage bahut bade bade steps le rahi hai sir. Hame bhi to ki aap ye samjho ki bhai hame bhi to aapke logo ki chinta hai na sir. Hum log abhi kal ki date mein aapka ROI nahi chalta hai to obviously baat hai ki bhai aap service ko renew nahi karoge sir. Ji ji ji. Company ko wo bhi to justification karna hi hai na sir. Wahi to bol raha hu na sir. Sir last kar ye hai ki hum log jo hai aage jo jo chhoti services hai usme waha pe lead kam karne ja rahe hain sir aage. Baki unki petition unnecessary ka itna jo competition increase ho raha hai wo bhi hum logo ko kam ho jaye sir. Ji ji ji. Ki unnecessary ki ek aisa customer hai ki jo service use hi nahi karta uske paas 40-40, 50 buyleads aa rahi to kahin na kahin cheeze kharab hi ho rahi hain sir. Haan wo waise hi kharab ho rahi hai. Ab jo customer wo cheeze jo hai na uske liye company aage step lene ja hi rahi hai sir. To aisa nahi hai ki bhai har cheez acknowledge kar hi rahe hain sir. But ye cheez hum log ensure kar hi rahe hain ki bhai aisa nahi hoga ki bhai kal ki date mein jo aapne investment kiya kabhi kabhi ek do mahine cheeze aisa time lagta hai ye hum log bhi samajh rahe hain. Ji ji ji. Wo right hai. Uska result na nikle sir. Ji ji ji wo right hai aapki baat. But but finally ye baat aati hai ki bhai usme hum log kitne time tak patience rakh paate hain to at the end wo cheez matter karti hai sir. Ji ji. Patience to kehne ka matlab ye hai ki main 6 mahine bhi rakh lu uske baad bhi koi business na nikle to phir kya matlab hai? Ab aapko main bolunga sir jo aapka basic service mein na nikalta to tab tab bhi to cheeze thi na aisa nahi hai. Basic mein aur isme isme farak hota hai sir. Iska charges bahut bhari ja raha hai 15000 ke kareeb ja raha hai per mahine ka. Aur basic mein 2-3000 per mahine aa raha hai. To aapko pata hai ki kitna farak aa gaya. Sir sari cheeze main aapki calculation sab sab cheeze sahi hain sir. Main ye nahi keh raha ki aapki calculation kahin se kahin tak galat hai sir. But aisa nahi ho sakta ki bhai pehle aapke paas 30 customer aa rahe the aaj ki date mein 70-72 lead aapke paas consume kar pa rahe ho to usme aapka ROI na badhe sir. Ji. Ji. Wo to badhe lekin phir bhi meri hai na lead lead sir aapko 50 lead hai na meri weekly hafte ki waise hi waise hi ja rahi hai. Aap dekho mera ye record utha ke. Wo hai. Kitne aate hain? Buyleads mein hai sir aapke. Ji. Abhi bhi 6 hafte puri 50 se 60 leade aise hi gayi thi. Ab main kya hai agar puri lead bhi consume kar lu aur phir main aapko bol du ke sir aapne aisa kiya aisa nahi kiya wo ek nasib ki baat hai customer verified ho ya na ho. Ab kehne ka matlab mere ko koi kaam dikhegi nahi to main aage kaise badhunga main sir? Wo hai. Wo wali baat hai. Aap to lead provide kar rahi hai aur chhoti temple ki mat karwaiye sir. Thoda weekly 1 lakh, 1.5 lakh tak ki karwaiye. Main ye nahi bol raha hu aap 5 lakh ka kaam dijiye, 10 lakh ka dijiye. Nahi nahi sir wo to hai asal mein aap logo ko bhi ye rehta hai hum log bhi customer ke keywords ke according uske according lead generate karte hain. But abhi koshish karte hain sir usme aur kya improvement kar sakte hain hum log. Ji ji ji ji. Ye do teen category wagera ka regarding bhi main ek bar main aap se discuss kar leta hu. Ye jo kuch as a kuch nayi keywords se related aapne jaise stone stone fountain ho gaya to hum log marble ke hi fountain banate hain na ya normal stone wagera ke banate hain sir? Nahi stone mein hum nahi karte hain sir. Stone mein kya hai ek to ek to kya hai customer ka nuksan ye hota hai. Accha. Ek to jaise kehne ka matlab jo bande kaam karte hain na to unko bhi jaise kehne ka matlab salary bhi jyada deni padti hai aur unke bimari wagera ka chance jyada hota hai stone mein. Accha accha accha accha stone mein samajh gaya. Ji ji. Us hisab se hum deal banwa ke to de dete hain lekin bahut kam chance hai hamara wo hai. Accha thik hai. Marble ek hi cheez hai ki apan usko kitni depth mein lo wo kabhi bhi aise nahi hai koi bimari pakda dega apan ko. Sahi baat hai sir. Stone mein apan teen mahine kaam karte hain na bande ko jar nahi padega 6 mahine ke andar ye guaranteed hai. Accha ji? Ji. Wo hai. Agar sahi marks wagera sahi laga ke kaam na kare na to 6 mahine mein nishchit hai wo jayega hi jayega. Ji wo hai. Ji. Jo jo companies is tarah ka kaam karati hai wo kabhi worker ke liye dekhti hai sir ki bhi ab aap aapka main tabhi to keh raha hu ki bhai aapka baat karne ka aapka kaam karne ka tarika alag hai sir. Ji ji ji. Aisa nahi ki bhai aapke liye bhi kahin na kahin employee bhi jo hai ek tarike se family member ki tarah ki bhai aisa nahi ki bhai khali kaam hai ek tarike se bhai uski bhi safety kahin na kahin matter karti hai sir. Bilkul bilkul wo wali baat hai wo sari cheeze hain. Isko jo hai na ye do category ko aap ek bar maine abhi aapko screenshot bheja hai inko do category ko na as a de-rank mein added hai. To ye jo settings mein jaake ye yaha pe remove kara lena sir ye do teen category. Kyunki unnecessary lead iski wajah se bhi aayegi to wo koi fayda nahi hai sir. Ji ji ji. Lead mein jaake buylead preference mein ye aapko option milega. Main aapko whatsapp kar diya hai to usko aap ek bar remove kara lena. Baki isme main koshish karke dekhta hu isme kya aur hum log de sakte hain sir aapko solution. Ji ji thik hai ji ok ok thik thik hai dhanyavad. Thank you thank you so much sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not converting into business.

- Lead flow decreased after executive's call.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Wants leads of higher value.

- No direct calls or messages are being received.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive explained the AI system functionality.

- Executive assured improvements in lead quality.

- Executive offered to check for additional solutions.

- Executive suggested removing two categories from derank.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check for additional solutions.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality, categories
